title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 7)
description: Henry avoids the questions of a wounded soldier. He fears the reception he will receive upon his return to his regiment and hopes that a Union defeat in the larger battle will lessen the shame of his cowardice.
meta: Use the Reading strategy of retelling to better understand a text
